welcomeMessage: Where direct democracy shapes self-regulated communities. Discuss, propose, and vote to build our future together.
seedSuccessDescRefresh: Database seeded successfully. You might need to refresh to see changes or if lists are empty.
login.descDefault: Log in to your Kratia Forums account.
login.descPendingAdmission: The admission application for {{username}} is currently under review by the community.
login.descEmailNotVerified: Please verify your email address {{email}} before logging in. Check your inbox for the verification link.
login.error.profileNotFound: User profile not found in our records after successful authentication.
login.error.profileIssue: There was an issue accessing your user profile. Please try again.
login.error.userNotFound: No user found with this email.
login.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
login.error.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.
login.error.tooManyRequests: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
login.error.genericFail: Login failed. An unexpected error occurred.
login.error.googleAuthFailed: Google Sign-In failed. Please try again.
login.error.googleProfileIssue: Could not retrieve or create your profile after Google Sign-In. Reason: {{reason}}
login.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials. Try signing in with the original method.
login.error.googleGenericFail: Google Sign-In failed. An unexpected error occurred.
signup.title: Apply to Join Kratia Forums
signup.description: Create your account and submit your application to the community.
signup.presentationPlaceholder: Tell the community a bit about yourself and why you'd like to join Kratia Forums...
signup.error.presentationTooShort: Your presentation must be at least 50 characters long.
signup.error.presentationTooShortGoogle: Please fill in your presentation (min. 50 characters) before signing up with Google.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the Terms and Conditions.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTermsGoogle: Please agree to the Terms and Conditions before signing up with Google.
signup.error.emailInUse: This email address is already in use.
signup.error.weakPassword: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters long.
signup.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
signup.error.genericFail: Sign up failed. An unexpected error occurred.
signup.error.googleSignupFailed: Google Sign-Up failed. Please try again.
signup.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials. Try signing in with the original method.
signup.error.googleGenericFail: Google Sign-Up failed. An unexpected error occurred.
signup.error.userSanctioned: User {{username}} is sanctioned and cannot re-apply at this time.
signup.error.googleUnexpected: An unexpected issue occurred during Google Sign-Up. {{reason}}
signup.toast.step1CompleteDesc: A verification link has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox to activate your account. Then log in to complete your admission request.
signup.toast.presentationRequiredDesc: Please write a brief presentation before signing up with Google.
signup.toast.agreementRequiredDesc: Please agree to the Terms and Conditions before signing up with Google.
signup.toast.accountExistsDesc: This email is already associated with an account. Please log in or use a different email.
forgotPassword.descDefault: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.descEmailSent: A password reset link has been sent to {{email}} if an account exists. Please check your inbox (and spam folder).
forgotPassword.checkSpamNote: If you don't see the email, please check your spam or junk folder.
forgotPassword.error.genericFail: Failed to send password reset email. Please try again later.
forgotPassword.toast.emailSentDesc: If {{email}} is associated with an account, a password reset link has been sent.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.title: Verify Your Email
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.descri: A verification link has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) to activate your Kratia account.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.toComp: to complete your admission request to the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.title: Application Submitted!
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.descrip: Your application to join Kratia Forums has been successfully submitted. It is now pending review and votation by the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.whatNex: You will be notified of the outcome. In the meantime, you can explore public content as a visitor.
confirmPage.default.title: Confirmation
confirmPage.default.description: Please check the status or go back to login.
sanctionedPage.title: Access Restricted
sanctionedPage.alertDescription: You are unable to participate in the community until your sanction ends.
sanctionedPage.optionsInfo: You can view public content as a visitor or log out.
adminPanel.title: Admin Panel
adminPanel.description: Manage users, forums, categories, and other settings for Kratia Forums.
adminPanel.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to view the admin panel. This area is restricted to administrators and founders.
adminPanel.error.fetchData: Failed to load admin data. Please try again.
adminPanel.userManagement.title: User Management
adminPanel.categoryManagement.title: Category Management
adminPanel.categoryManagement.table.name: Name
adminPanel.categoryManagement.noCategori: No categories found. You can create one to start organizing forums.
adminPanel.forumManagement.title: Forum Management
adminPanel.forumManagement.table.name: Name
adminPanel.deleteForumDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
adminPanel.deleteForumDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the forum "{{forumName}}".
Associated threads and posts will NOT be deleted and will become orphaned. Consider archiving or re-categorizing threads first if needed.
adminPanel.toast.errorDeletingForumDesc: Could not delete the forum. Please try again.
adminCreateCategory.title: Create New Category
adminCreateCategory.description: Fill in the details below to add a new category for forums.
adminCreateCategory.descriptionPlacehold: A brief description of what this category is about.
adminCreateCategory.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to create categories.
adminCreateCategory.toast.errorDesc: Could not create the category. Please try again.
adminEditCategory.title: Edit Category: {{categoryName}}
adminEditCategory.description: Modify the details of this category.
adminEditCategory.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to edit categories.
adminEditCategory.error.loadFail: Failed to load category data. Please try again.
adminEditCategory.error.genericNotFound: The category you are trying to edit could not be found.
adminEditCategory.toast.errorDesc: Could not update the category. Please try again.
adminCreateForum.title: Create New Forum
adminCreateForum.description: Fill in the details below to add a new forum to Kratia.
adminCreateForum.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of what this forum is about.
adminCreateForum.isPublicLabel: Publicly visible (guests can view threads and posts)
adminCreateForum.isAgoraLabel: Is Agora Forum (Special Votation Forum - Disabled)
adminCreateForum.isAgoraTooltip: The 'Agora' forum is special and cannot be created or modified through this form.
adminCreateForum.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to create forums.
adminCreateForum.error.noCategories: No categories found. Please create a category before creating a forum.
adminCreateForum.error.fetchCategoriesFa: Failed to load categories. Please try again.
adminCreateForum.toast.errorDesc: Could not create the forum. Please try again.
adminEditForum.title: Edit Forum: {{forumName}}
adminEditForum.description: Modify the details of this forum.
adminEditForum.isPublicLabel: Publicly visible (guests can view threads and posts)
adminEditForum.isAgoraTooltip: The 'Agora' status of a forum cannot be changed after creation.
adminEditForum.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to edit forums.
adminEditForum.error.noCategories: No categories found. Cannot edit forum category properly.
adminEditForum.error.loadFail: Failed to load forum or category data. Please try again.
adminEditForum.error.genericNotFound: The forum you are trying to edit could not be found.
adminEditForum.toast.errorDesc: Could not update the forum. Please try again.
adminEditUser.title: Edit User: {{username}}
adminEditUser.description: Modify the details for this user. Changes are applied directly.
adminEditUser.emailChangeNote: Changing email may affect user login if email is the primary identifier.
adminEditUser.aboutMePlaceholder: A brief description about the user.
adminEditUser.adminActionAlertDesc: Changes made here directly modify user data. Use with caution. User sanctioning should ideally follow the community votation process via the Agora.
adminEditUser.accessDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to edit users.
adminEditUser.error.loadFail: Failed to load user data. Please try again.
adminEditUser.error.genericNotFound: The user you are trying to edit could not be found.
adminEditUser.toast.founderCannotChangeO: Founders cannot change their own role.
adminEditUser.toast.errorDesc: Could not update the user. Please try again.
